Blistering Invective - Burning Blood Vendetta 2e You curse the target, punishing it for having the audacity to spill your blood. Deal bludgeoning damage on a failed constitution saving throw or half as much on a success. The target is immediately slain, and the explosion deals [1] to creatures within 20 feet of it on a failed dexterity saving throw, or half as much on a success. Fireproof 2e You prevent the target item from conducting heat or catching fire for the spell's duration. Waterproof 2e You prevent the target item from taking on water or becoming wet for the duration of the spell. Each time you hit a creature with an attack, one of the wisps goes hurtling towards another creature, dealing [1] and set your target and the second creature on fire. You regain 1 flame wisps when you cast a spell and do fire damage. Flame Wisp A flame wisp that deals [1]. Sparkling Swing An attack that shoots out one of your flame wisps at another creature. Impeccable Flow You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world gaining a +[1] status bonus to skill checks, saving throws, and attack rolls. Loose Time's Arrow 2e You pluck the time stream like a bow—pull one string back, release, and watch a creature fly. All affected targets can dash for free on their turn Loose Time's Arrow You can dash once for free on your turn. You gain the undead tag, gain resistance to necrotic damage, and vulnerability to radiant damage. Mimic Undead You have the undead tag Remove Fear 2e With a touch, you ease a creature's fears, and bolster its resolve to be unaffected by it for 1 minute. Consecrated Flesh 2e Through the strength of your faith, your body becomes infused with holy energy. You take an additional [1] when taking necrotic damage, and reduce [2] taken. Action to Bonus Actions 2e Turn an action into 2 bonus actions Bonus Actions to Action 2e Turn 2 bonus actions into an action Blastback 2e You hit the ground with a shuddering boom, propelling the force of your fall out in a wave. You take no damage from the fall as the displaced air allows you to land gently, but all other creatures in the spell's area take [1]. Creatures that fail their save are also pushed back [2] feet. Envenom Companion 2e You envenom your companion's attacks, which drip with highly toxic venom for the spell's duration. The creature's weapon deals an additional [1]. A creature that is damaged by this poison must attempt a Constitution save. On a failure, on a failure it becomes clumsy for 1 round. Envenomed Your piercing and slashing weapon attacks deal an additional [1], and possibly make your target clumsy. Firework Blasts 2e You create a massive display of loud and colorful explosions, dealing [1]. Focusing Hum 2e You infuse the air around you with a sustained hum that allows creatures within it to resist distractions. Creatures within the area have advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws, and are immune to the confused condition. However you can not become hidden. Focusing Hum You have advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws. Humming You have advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws, but can not become hidden. Ghostly Weapon 2e The target weapon becomes translucent and ghostly, and it can affect material and incorporeal creatures and objects. It ignores resistance to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage. Ghostly Weapon Ignores physical resistance Haste 2e Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains an extra bonus action on each of its turns. Quickened Gain an extra bonus action on your turn. Heroism 2e You tap into the target's inner heroism, granting it a +[1] bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. Heroism Gain a +[1] bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. Invisibility Sphere 2e You and all targets are invisible except to each other as long as you remain within the spell's area. If a creature made invisible by this spell leaves the spell's area, it becomes visible and remains so even if it returns to the spell's area. Invisibility Sphere You emit an aura that turns others around you invisbile. Life Connection 2e When you cast this spell, you place a failsafe deep within the life force of the target. You can sense when the target takes damage. A creature can be part of no more than one life connection simultaneously. As a reaction, when your target takes lethal damage, you may choose to take damage for them instead. Life Connection When your connected target takes lethal damage, you can take it for them instead as a reaction. You have your life connected by another target to themselves. Positive Attunement 2e You attune a creature to the Upper Planes, connecting its life force without fully transporting it. The creature's appearance becomes more brightly colored. If the creature is living, it regain [1] immediately and at the end of each turn. If the creature is undead, it instead takes [2]. Positive Attunement Regain [1]. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 10 turns. Time Jump 2e You leap forward a few seconds in time, appearing across the battlefield in the blink of an eye. You may charge twice, before time unfreezes. Time Jump Time has stopped until you charge twice. Rush charge forward [1]. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above and around you, dealing [1]. Then for the duration, your weapon deal an additional [2]. Draw the Lightning This weapon deals an additional [1]. Girzanje's March Gain a +[1] bonus to attack rolls, Constitution saves, and Wisdom saves. Hydraulic Torrent 2e A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals [1]. Creatures and objects that fail the save are also knocked back [2]. Mercurial Stride 2e Your form ripples as you take on the fluidity and toxicity of quicksilver. You partially shift into a liquid metal form and charge for up to [1]. Passing through a creature's space in this way exposes it to mercury poisoning, and creatures become sickened and take [2] on a failed Constitution saving throw. Sickened Take a -[1] penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and Spell Save DCs. Radiant Beam 2e You fire a beam of blinding light from your outstretched hands. The beam deals [1]. On a failed saving throw, a creature becomes dazzled for 4 rounds, or dazzled for 1 round on a success. Soothing Spring 2e A shower of restoring spring water gives those within the area the benefit of a short rest. Weapon Storm 2e You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation, dealing [1] (twice your weapon's damage) on a failed Dexterity save, or half as much on a success. Weapon Storm Cone Weapon Storm Burst Winning Streak 2e The target is energized by its good fortune as it spreads to others—as long as they keep winning. It is quickened for 1 round. If the target or one of their allies within 20 feet hits an attack roll, they are also quickened if they weren't already, and the duration of the winning streak is extended by another round. Winning Streak You are quickened, and allies within [1] of you who successfully land a hit also gains this aura. Stoneskin 2e The target's skin hardens like stone. reducing physical damage by [1]. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, stoneskin's duration decreases by 5 turn. Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. Vital Beacon Allies can touch you to regain [1]. You Fly [1] directly away from the triggering creature. Attempt to Demoralize all enemies within 30 feet. Each creature that becomes frightened by it additionally takes a –[1] circumstance penalty to the attack rolls for 1 minute. After the spell, your head sews back together as if it had never split apart. You regain Hit Points equal to half piercing damage the target takes. Breath of Life 2e Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from dying and restore Hit Points to the target for [1]. Can't take actions, bonus actions, or reactions, can not move. Death Ward 2e You shield a creature from the ravages of negative energy. It receives a +4 bonus to saves against death and negative effects, reducing [1] taken. Warded from Death you gain a +4 bonus to death saving throws and reduce [1] taken. Forceful Hand 2e Create a combat capable hand made out of force. Lightning Storm 2e You create a black, rumbling storm cloud and call down one lightning bolt within the spell's area. The bolt is a vertical line from the top of the storm cloud to the ground below, dealing [1] to creatures in the area. On subsequent rounds, you use a bonus action to call down another lightning bolt within the area. Call Lightning Bolt Call down a lightning bolt dealing [1]. Plant Form 2e Turn into a Wood Woad Repelling Pulse 2e You unleash a powerful pulse of telekinetic power, and the pulse violently hurls creatures away from you. Each creature in the area takes [1] and are pushed [2] away from you. Scouring Pulse 2e You inundate the area with concentrated positive energy, which scours away the stain of undeath. Each creature in the area takes [1]. Creatures that fail the save also take [2] each turn. Creatures that take persistent radiant damage from scouring pulse are wreathed in a heatless halo of light. They emit bright light in a 5-foot radius preventing them from becoming invisible. Scouring Flame Taking [1] each turn and can not turn invisible Storm Burst 2e Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning and wind that deals [1] and pushes creatures within [2] away from the center of the burst. Creatures who failed the save is also stunned. Synaptic Pulse You emit a pulsating mental blast that penetrates the minds of all enemies in the area, stunning them. Elemental Form 2e Elemental Form: Fire Elemental Form: Air Elemental Form: Earth Elemental Form: Water Turn into an elemental Flame Dancer Fire encircles the target's hands and feet, and its eyes and hair catch ablaze. The target's unarmed Strikes deal an additional [1]. Critical hits with these Strikes also deal [2] each turn. Additionally, when the target attempts to Demoralize a foe, they can use Performance instead of Intimidation. Flame Dancing Deal an additional [1] with unarmed strikes, and [2] each turn on critical hits. Blanket of Stars 2e ======================= 6th level ============================ A flowing cloak of utter darkness drapes over you, filled with pinpricks of light like distant stars. It imparts the stillness of the cosmos to you, granting you greater Invisibility. For the duration of the spell, you may cast Magic Missile at 3rd level once per turn. Blanket of Stars Greater Invisibility and can cast magic missile at 3rd level on each of your turns. Cast into Time 2e You release a wave of temporal energy that sends creatures violently tumbling through time, scarring their thoughts with the information flowing around them. Although the journey can feel like it lasts for minutes or even days, the targets reappear almost instantly. Witnessing this chaotic flow of time and being bashed against objects from different times deals the targets [1] and [2]. A creature that falls into time disappears until the end of your turn. Casted into Time casted into time, taking [1] and [2] upon returning casted into time, taking [1] and [2] upon returning, and becomed sickened Chain Lightning 2e You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing [1]. The lightning arcs to another hostile creature within [2] of the first target, jumps to another hostile creature within [2] of that target, and so on until there are no new targets. Devil Form 2e Turn into a cambion Elemental Confluence 2e You conjure four types of elementals who combine forces to form into a chaotic storm. Switch Element Necrotize 2e You necrotize part of a creature's body, harming it and debilitating it as its body putrefies, mimicking the natural process of decay. The target takes [1] and one of the debilitations. Necrotize Bones Your target have vulnerability to bludgeoning damage as its bones become brittle Necrotize Joints Your target become clumsy [1] as its joints become stiff Necrotize Legs Your target's speed is reduced by 20ft as its legs breaks apart Necrotize Muscles Your target's becomes enfeebled [1] as its muscles starts to rot Phantom Orchestra 2e You orchestrate an invisible ensemble of lost sounds captured inside errant breezes across the Plane of Air, and you can direct this symphony to attack foes within range. When you Cast the Spell, a captured breath of ephemeral music explodes in a great crescendo, appearing in a space you choose within range, dealing [1] and deafens creature within. As a bonus action after you cast the spell until the spell ends, you can create another explosion of music. Repulsion 2e You manifest an aura that prevents hostile creatures from approaching within up to [1] of you. Repulsed Cannot Move Repulsed Saved Movement speed halved Repulsion - 40ft Repulsion - 30ft Repulsion - 20ft Repulsion - 10ft Spellwrack 2e You cause any spells cast on the target to spill out their energy in harmful surges. Target creature become vulnerable to spells and take [1] each turn when damaged by a spell. Spellwracked Any spell that damages you causes you to take [1] each turn Spellwracked Persistent Damage Taking [1] each turn Righteous Might 2e Summon a Divine Armament into your hand Righteous Might Divine Armament You [1] less physical damaage, an additional [2] of movement, your AC becomes [3]+Dexterity, and you gain expertise in Athletics. Dismiss Righteous Might Angel Form 2e ======================= 7th level ============================ Turn into an Angel Angelic Greatsword Angelic Greatsword Corrosive Body 2e You exhale corrosive gas, and acidic secretions coat your skin as you transform into a being of living acid. Cosmic Form 2e Transform into a large cosmic being Cosmic Form Sun Transform into an avatar of the Sun Cosmic Form Moon Transform into an avatar of the Moon Eclipse Burst 2e A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing [1] to creatures in the area, plus [2] to living creatures. The area then is covered in a shroud of darkness. Energy Aegis 2e You take [1] reduced elemental, force, necrotic, and radiant damage. Entrancing Eyes Your eyes glow with an entrancing radiance that captivates those who meet your gaze. Creatures within 9m of you become Stupified on a failed Intelligence Saving throw. Entracing Eye - Stare You focus your gaze on a creature, and they must make an Intelligence saving throw as if they are within 9m of you. If your target is already Stupified, they are instead Paralyzed. Moonburst 2e A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing [1] to creatures and objects in the area, plus [2] to undead creatures. Prismatic Armor 2e You wrap the target in armor made of multicolored light. Acting as an energy Aegis for the duration. Attackers are dazzled on a successful Constitution saving throw or blinded on a failed one. Regenerate 2e An infusion of positive energy grants a creature continuous healing. The target restores [1] to it at the start of each of its turns. While it has regeneration, the target can't die from damage. If the target takes acid or fire damage, its regeneration deactivates until after the end of its next turn. Shock to the System 2e A dense lightning cloud descends to fill the target's space, then fires a jolt of revitalizing lightning into the target. The target comes back to life if it is dead, regain 8d8 hit points and become quickened for 1 minute. Thundering Strike - Shock to the System You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures. Shock to the System You can cast Thundering Strike. True Target 2e You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out a vision of that future to those around you. Attacks against target creature have advantage, and are considered critical hits on hit. Hypnotic Terror 2e ================ 8th LEVEL ================ You send a wave of nightmarish visions crashing over your targets, leaving them paralyzed by fear. These visions inflict real wounds on vulnerable targets, dealing [1]. Maze 2e You transport the target into an extradimensional maze of eldritch origin and trap it there. Once each turn, the target can spend 1 action to attempt a Survival check or Perception check against your spell DC to escape the maze. Maze - Trapped Trapped in the maze, can find the right path on a successful survival check. Maze - On Right Track On the right path to escape the maze, can escape on a successful survival check, or lose the right track on a failure. Maze - Technical. In a maze. Moment of Renewal 2e The targets experience a day's worth of recovery in an instant. You do not restore spell slots above 3rd level. Monstrosity Form 2e Turn into a Bulette or a Hook Horror Bulette Form Change into a Bulette Poor Ruos Hook Horror Calling Reinforcement Change into a Hook Horror Polar Ray 2e You fire a blue-white ray of freezing air and sleet that deals [1] and drains the target. Drained Constitution reduced by [1]. Summon Archmage 2e You briefly call forth the spirit of a legendary wizard from ages long past Summon Irii You briefly call forth the spirit of Fate or Fortune. Aura of Fate Project an Aura of Fate to friends and foe within 9m You can not roll lower than a 10 for attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. You take a -3 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. (the average result of this is the same as treating rolling 10 or above as a 10) Aura of Fortune Project an Aura of Fortune to friends and foe within 9m You have advantage on all Attack rolls, saving throws and skill checks. You have disadvantage on all Attack rolls, saving throws and skill checks Summon Irii - Fate Summon a spirit of Fate. Allies within 9m treat attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks below a 10 as a 10, and enemies treat 10 or above as a 10 (this equivalent as a -3). Summon Irii - Fortune Summon a spirit fo Fortune. Allies within 9m have advantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks, and enemies have disadvantage. Summon Diefic Herald 2e Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The effect of the spell will be determined by your diety's alignment. Diefic Herald - Good Allies within 9m gain the reaction Retributive Strike You gain the reaction Retributive Strike Diefic Herald - Netrual Allies within 9m are quickened and take 20 reduced Necrotic and Radiant damage. You are quickened and take 20 reduced Necrotic and Radiant damage. Diefic Herald - Evil Allies within 9m gain the reaction Iron Command You gain the reaction Iron Command Retributive Strike You protect your ally and strike your foe. The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage and you may make a melee Strike against the foe. Iron Command You put an impertinent foe who dared harm you in their proper place. You command your enemy to kneel before you in obedience.
